languages.text: Даже после смерти Предок следит за каждым вашим шагом. Голова генетического отродья служит горьким напоминанием о том, что враги человечества могут таиться не только извне, но и среди союзников.

Even in death, the Sire continues to watch your every step. The head of the genetic abomination serves as a bitter reminder that a great many of Humanity's enemies are hiding within the ranks of its allies.
languages.original_text: Даже после смерти Предок следит за каждым вашим шагом. Голова генетического отродья служит горьким напоминанием о том, что враги человечества могут таиться не только извне, но и среди союзников.

Even in death, the Sire continues to watch your every step. The head of the genetic abomination serves as a bitter reminder that a great many of Humanity's enemies are hiding within the ranks of its allies.

languages.text: 死してなお、サイアはあなたの一歩一歩を監視している。遺伝的忌まわしき者の首は、人類の大敵の多くが味方の内部に潜んでいるという苦い警告なのである。
languages.original_text: Even in death, the Sire continues to watch your every step. The head of the genetic abomination serves as a bitter reminder that a great many of Humanity's enemies are hiding within the ranks of its allies.

traits.locale_text: 死してなお、サイアはあなたの一歩一歩を監視している。遺伝的忌まわしき者の首は、人類の大敵の多くが味方の内部に潜んでいるという苦い警告なのである。

languages.text: Selbst im Tode beobachtet der Schöpfer jeden deiner Schritte. Der Kopf der genetischen Abscheulichkeit ist eine bittere Erinnerung daran, dass sehr viele Feinde der Menschheit sich in den Reihen ihrer Verbündeten verstecken.
languages.original_text: Even in death, the Sire continues to watch your every step. The head of the genetic abomination serves as a bitter reminder that a great many of Humanity's enemies are hiding within the ranks of its allies.

traits.locale_text: Selbst im Tode beobachtet der Schöpfer jeden deiner Schritte. Der Kopf der genetischen Abscheulichkeit ist eine bittere Erinnerung daran, dass sehr viele Feinde der Menschheit sich in den Reihen ihrer Verbündeten verstecken.

languages.text: Incluso muerto, el Progenitor sigue observando tus pasos. La cabeza de esa abominación genética sirve de amargo recordatorio: muchos de los enemigos de la Humanidad se esconden entre sus aliados.
languages.original_text: Even in death, the Sire continues to watch your every step. The head of the genetic abomination serves as a bitter reminder that a great many of Humanity's enemies are hiding within the ranks of its allies.

traits.locale_text: Incluso muerto, el Progenitor sigue observando tus pasos. La cabeza de esa abominación genética sirve de amargo recordatorio: muchos de los enemigos de la Humanidad se esconden entre sus aliados.

languages.text: 即便已经身死，虫群族长也依然凝视着你的一举一动。这头基因怪物的头颅提醒着所有人这样的严峻真相——许多人类的敌人恰恰藏身于人类之间。
languages.original_text: Even in death, the Sire continues to watch your every step. The head of the genetic abomination serves as a bitter reminder that a great many of Humanity's enemies are hiding within the ranks of its allies.

traits.locale_text: 即便已经身死，虫群族长也依然凝视着你的一举一动。这头基因怪物的头颅提醒着所有人这样的严峻真相——许多人类的敌人恰恰藏身于人类之间。

languages.text: Efendi, ölümünde bile her adımımızı izlemeye devam ediyor. Genetik bir sapkınlık olan bu yaratığın başı, insanlığın düşmanlarının çoğunun müttefik saflarında saklandığını acı bir şekilde hatırlatıyor.
languages.original_text: Even in death, the Sire continues to watch your every step. The head of the genetic abomination serves as a bitter reminder that a great many of Humanity's enemies are hiding within the ranks of its allies.

traits.locale_text: Efendi, ölümünde bile her adımımızı izlemeye devam ediyor. Genetik bir sapkınlık olan bu yaratığın başı, insanlığın düşmanlarının çoğunun müttefik saflarında saklandığını acı bir şekilde hatırlatıyor.

languages.text: Malgré sa mort, le Sire continue à surveiller le moindre de vos faits et gestes. La tête de l'abomination génétique vous rappelle amèrement qu'un grand nombre d'ennemis de l'humanité se cachent au sein même des rangs de ses alliés.
languages.original_text: Even in death, the Sire continues to watch your every step. The head of the genetic abomination serves as a bitter reminder that a great many of Humanity's enemies are hiding within the ranks of its allies.
